creditline: Gift of funds from Ellen and Sheldon Sturgis, Richard and Roberta Simmons, and The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Three-panel huipil; white ground with colored stripe on each arm seam; central panel has various geometric patterns in rows on uper 3/5 of piece; colors unknown (slide not found); side panels  geometric motifs spaced evenly across panel in rows; brocade m ano at shoulders.
title: Saint's huipil?
